backend/main.mo: Main actor defining property data types, search criteria, analytics structures, and including storage and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing mapâ€‘autocomplete related features, affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend files and their functionality across components, pages, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/.env: Environment file containing the live Google Maps API key and configuration notes for required APIs and billing.
frontend/.env.example: Template environment file with detailed setup instructions for obtaining and configuring a Google Maps API key.
frontend/GOOGLE_MAPS_SETUP.md: Documentation explaining how to configure Google Maps API keys, enable APIs, set billing, and apply restrictions.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling with OKLCH color variables and light/dark mode theme definitions.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting favicon, page title, and loading the main frontend script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, profile setup, page navigation, and layout with role-based access.
frontend/src/components/AdminResetContro: Admin-only control providing a confirmation dialog to reset all application data to a fresh draft.
frontend/src/components/AgentForm.tsx: Form component for adding or editing agent profiles with validation and backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying association info and a credit link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with navigation, authentication controls, and user profile display with admin-aware menu items.
frontend/src/components/MapLinkedInsight: Generates real-time analytics and charts based on filtered map property data.
frontend/src/components/PropertyMap.tsx: Large Google Maps component handling markers, clustering, filters, search, radius tools, and heatmaps for property visualization.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading identities, handling login/logout, and wrapping the app in an auth provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, roles, agents, and property-related data using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom CSS variables for light and dark theme colors and layout tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that initializes React, QueryClient, and the Internet Identity provider before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/AgentsPage.tsx: Admin-only page to list, add, edit, and deactivate agents using query hooks with role-based access control.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Fetches agents, properties, and inquiries, computes dashboard stats, and displays summary cards and category counts with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/InquiriesPage.tsx: Manages inquiry listing, creation, and editing with validation, dialogs, and agent/property selection.
frontend/src/pages/PropertiesPage.tsx: Handles property listing, map-based filtering, creation and editing forms, and image uploads with previews and validation.
frontend/src/pages/ReportsPage.tsx: Generates analytics reports including charts, status/category distributions, and map-linked insights using fetched property and inquiry data.
frontend/src/types/google-maps.d.ts: Provides minimal type declarations for Google Maps objects and marker clustering used by map components.
frontend/src/utils/googlePlaces.ts: Parses Google Place results into normalized location fields and extracts coordinates and display text.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, storing, clearing, and persisting URL and session parameters with hash-routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project state including version info, issues related to Google Maps autocomplete, and a list of feature requirements for map search fixes and admin UI controls.
